statements: SELECT * FROM student_projects;
SELECT project_name, submission_date FROM student_projects WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM student_projects ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM student_projects WHERE submission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_projects FROM student_projects WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT project_id, project_name, student_id, project_description, submission_date FROM student_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, submission_date FROM student_projects WHERE student_id = 2 ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_projects WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01' AND submission_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, student_id FROM student_projects WHERE project_description LIKE '%research%';
SELECT COUNT(project_id) AS total_projects FROM student_projects WHERE student_id = 3 GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, project_title FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT project_description, submission_date FROM students WHERE project_title LIKE 'A%';
SELECT student_name, feedback_date FROM students JOIN feedback ON students.student_id = feedback.student_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, project_title FROM students WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT s.student_name, f.feedback_content FROM students s JOIN feedback f ON s.student_id = f.student_id;
SELECT student_name, project_title, submission_date FROM students ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, project_description FROM students WHERE project_description LIKE '%interesting%';
SELECT * FROM StudentProjects ORDER BY project_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM StudentProjects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ResearchPapers WHERE paper_publish_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT paper_title, paper_author FROM ResearchPapers WHERE paper_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT portfolio_id, submission_date FROM Portfolios ORDER BY submission_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM StudentProjects WHERE project_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM StudentProjects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ResearchPapers ORDER BY paper_publish_date DESC;
SELECT paper_title, paper_author FROM ResearchPapers WHERE paper_author LIKE '%John%';
SELECT portfolio_id, submission_date FROM Portfolios WHERE student_id = 123 ORDER BY submission_date;
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, student_id FROM projects WHERE project_id = 'dbe1685c-0e6e-4b1d-9654-4c10aec7c593';
SELECT project_name, submission_date FROM projects WHERE student_id = '500f5b6d-0702-4989-805d-cd09c40224e1';
SELECT * FROM portfolios WHERE project_id = 'f008ba5f-5a85-420d-87f7-dce8d17ddbf3';
SELECT teacher_name, department FROM teachers WHERE department IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, student_id FROM projects ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT paper_title, submission_date FROM research_papers WHERE submission_date < '2022-03-15';
SELECT project_id, portfolio_description FROM portfolios WHERE project_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM teachers WHERE department IN ('Computer Science', 'Mathematics');
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students ORDER BY student_grade DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM Projects WHERE project_id = 'a1234567-8901-2345-6789-abcde1234567';
SELECT paper_title, published_date FROM ResearchPapers WHERE published_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT assessment_id, project_id, paper_id, portfolio_id, score FROM Assessments ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM Projects WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT paper_title, published_date FROM ResearchPapers ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 80 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(score) AS average_score FROM Assessments;
